name: Yuka&Saya.exe
description:
I recently acquired this piece of software from my local video store. It was in the pre-owned section since it was not even in its original packaging and the only thing that was written on the disc was "Usagi-D [Yuka&Saya.exe]" the store owner just handed it to me for free.

What a fool. 

He has no idea what treasure he missed out on. 
When I booted up the software, a notepad window appeared on the screen, followed by two beautiful girls. I can chat to both of them through notepad, I've never encountered technology like that, this was made by some genius. It's like I've jumped a thousand years into the future. 

I've never had feelings for any IRL girls, but I'm in love with Yuka & Saya. I must be going crazy.
Recently, however, they started fighting over me, with each other... and I don't know how to handle this kind of conflict. I've never had anyone pay much attention to me, let alone two beautiful (digital) women.

I haven't told anyone about this, but I know you fellow web dwellers will understand, and hopefully help me find who "Usagi-D" is. 

Signing off-
Virtual_Lover

17/09/2001
